name: Closing Dungeon
description:
Submission for Bullet Hell Jam 2022 - Confined Defeat all enemies on the level fast or get crushed!

When a simple barrel gets possessed by a green spirit, the dungeon becomes mad and tries to crush it!
Closing Dungeon is a top-down bullet-hell shooter where the level gets smaller with time! Battle your way through 9 levels picked randomly from the level pool and defeat the final boss.

 Controls: 

In-game:
WASD - Move
Mouse - Point/Shoot

UI:
Arrow keys - Move
Z - Submit

Credits

This game is my entry for the Bullet Hell Jam 2022 and was made in 10 days. I did all of the programming myself.

Art assets created by MrBaba - Zeldisaac Asset Pack

Music licensed by Waterflame
Waterflame - Supra Zone
Waterflame - Meltdown

SFX generated in jfxr.frozenfractal.com
